column3: I am thankful the most important key in history was invented. It's not the key to your house, your car, your boat, your safety deposit box, your bike lock or your private community. It's the key to order, sanity, and peace of mind. The key is 'Delete.'
The new information technology... Internet and e-mail... have practically eliminated the physical costs of communications.
The internet could be a very positive step towards education, organisation and participation in a meaningful society.

One of the most feared expressions in modern times is 'The computer is down.'

I think it's fair to say that personal computers have become the most empowering tool we've ever created. They're tools of communication, they're tools of creativity, and they can be shaped by their user.

Anyway, all these computers and digital gadgets are no good. They just fill your head with numbers and that can't be good for you.

Beatbullying's 'The Big March 2012' is such a brilliant campaign and I am very proud to be a part of it. I have been a victim of cyber bullying myself and I know firsthand just how hurtful it can be.
